text: Yara bale, ‘niscaya mara'iyama-tanaya masiha'i allaha’, tara abasya'i kuphari kareche [1]. Baluna, ‘allaha yadi mara'iyama-tanaya masiha, tamra mata ebam duniyara sakalake dhbansa karate icche karena tabe tamke bamdha debara sakti kara ache?’ Ara asamanasamuha o yamina ebam e duyera madhye ya kichu ache tara sarbabhaumatba allahara'i. Tini ya icche srsti karena [2] ebam allaha sabakichura upara ksamatabana
